original_text: because your heart was tender and you humbled yourself before God when you heard his words against this place and its inhabitants, and you have humbled yourself before me and have torn your clothes and wept before me, I also have heard you, declares the Lord.
korean_text: 내가 이 곳과 그 주민을 가리켜 말한 것을 네가 듣고 마음이 연약하여 하나님 앞 곧 내 앞에서 겸손하여 옷을 찢고 통곡하였으므로 나도 네 말을 들었노라 여호와가 말하였느니라

sentences.original_text: and you humbled yourself before God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 하나님 앞에서 자신을 낮췄다

sentences.original_text: against this place and its inhabitants
and you have humbled yourself before me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 내 앞에서 자신을 낮췄다
